name: spec-kit
description: Repo for learning and practicing spec-kit

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:contract
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:frontend
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:ci:backend && npm run test:ci:frontend && npm run test:contract
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:backend && npm run type-check:frontend
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:check: npm run format:check:backend && npm run format:check:frontend
scripts.db:setup: cd backend && npm run db:generate && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:ci
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend
scripts.verify: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run test:ci && npm run build
